review: My girls love running around practicing their FPS skills with the large interactive coloring world.  Great game for kids to get them to start understanding video game controls on the PC.

review:
Very nice and relaxing game for children aged 6 and up.
Son (11) was glad to train his WASD skills in a safe and intriguing environment.
Daughter (8) used a controller, and enjoyed the game quite a lot.
